author: bridge-bot
content:
<rudolf6> Quick plug for this event, as it's especially relevant for folks here :)
https://ethinteropforum.com

- Nov 16th in Bangkok
- limited in-person capacity (~200), priority to those actively working on interop
- also will be recorded / public livestream
- event kicks off with panel of L2 founders discussing eth-wide interop, followed by breakout room discussions

Please rsvp asap if interested! DM w/ any questions ğŸ™
